name: Super MeatBall
description:
Welcome to Super MeatBall !!

The game features 3 characters for the moment : Meat Ball, Ice Cude and Wood Stick.

All the level in the game has different feature and gameplay ! Feel free to explore them !!

For now the game is free and there is no way to support me, for now.

I'm planing to add Android support for the game. Remember also that the game is still in beta and is not well done so be prepared to see bugs.
